qas.question: When was the state run Nehru Government Engineering College started?
What are a few pioneer universities in the state?

answers.text: The Indian Institute of Technology Mandi, Himachal Pradesh University Shimla, Institute of Himalayan Bioresource Technology (IHBT, CSIR Lab)

qas.question: What is the most renowned argricultural institues?

answers.text: CSK Himachal Pradesh Krishi Vishwavidyalya Palampur

qas.question: What is Dr. Yashwant Singh Parmar University earned?

answers.text: unique distinction in India for imparting teaching, research and extension education in horticulture, forestry and allied disciplines

plausible_answers.text: one of the most renowned hill agriculture institutes

qas.question: What is the Indian Institute of Technology Mandi known for in the world?
What recognition has IEC University earned?

plausible_answers.text: for imparting teaching, research and extension education in horticulture, forestry and allied disciplines

qas.question: Why has IEC University earned distinction?
When did IEC University start in Sundernagar?

plausible_answers.text: CSK Himachal Pradesh Krishi Vishwavidyalya Palampur

qas.question: What is one of the most renowned IT institutes?

context: <a1_0>The Indian Institute of Technology Mandi, Himachal Pradesh University Shimla, Institute of Himalayan Bioresource Technology (IHBT, CSIR Lab)<a1_0/>, Palampur, the National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur, Indian Institute of Information Technology, Una the Central University Dharamshala, AP Goyal (Alakh Prakash Goyal) Shimla University, The Bahra University (Waknaghat, Solan) the Baddi University of Emerging Sciences and Technologies Baddi, IEC University, Shoolini University Of Biotechnology and Management Sciences, Solan, Manav Bharti University Solan, the Jaypee University of Information Technology Waknaghat, Eternal University, Sirmaur & Chitkara University Solan are some of the pioneer universities in the state. <a2_0><b8_0>CSK Himachal Pradesh Krishi Vishwavidyalya Palampur<b8_0/><a2_0/> is <b4_0>one of the most renowned hill agriculture institutes<b4_0/> in world. Dr. Yashwant Singh Parmar University of Horticulture and Forestry has earned <b5_0>a <a3_0>unique distinction in India<b5_0/> <b6_0>for imparting teaching, research and extension education in horticulture, forestry and allied disciplines<b6_0/><a3_0/>. Further, state-run Jawaharlal Nehru Government Engineering College started <b7_0>in <a0_0>2006<b7_0/> at Sundernagar<a0_0/>.
